titleStmt.title: The Army vindicated, in their late dissolution of the Parliament: with several cautions and directions in point of a new representative. Published for the satisfaction of all the real and cordial members of the Commonwealth, whose aid and assistance is required herein, by John Spittlehouse, a late member of the Army.
titleStmt.author: Spittlehouse, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Moone, at the Seven Stars in Paul's Church-yard, neer the great North-door.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Seven Stars in Paul's Church-yard, neer the great North-door.
